description: Jonathan Harder’s time at Castle Bare is taking its toll on him. He finally understands that sex is all the count thinks of… and that cum is all he feeds on. And as Jonathan wears down, so does his inability to resist the temptations Barebackula throws at him. When Barebackula appears in Jonathan’s room one night and calls upon the demonic servants Mario Domenech and Alex Kof, Jonathan submits. Their presence compels Jonathan to strip down and give up his beautiful body. There’s no sexual act the demons don’t seduce Jonathan with. He can’t control himself -- and he doesn’t want to. All the while, the demons are preparing him for their master.
title: Barebackula Grants Jonathan Harder A Raw Threesome
